item.description:
Things To Do Boston has invited the Red Sox Natives to attend their Launch Party at Ned Devines from 7 -10 pm on Thursday, April 15. This event is free - courtesy of the new Boston Things To Do Team.

For more information on TTD Boston, please visit www.thingstodoboston.com

Come out, meet the TTD team, and learn about future events being planned around Boston.

There will be a complimentary apps, giveaways, a DJ (Retro & Top 40 hits), dancing and more. Win a Free Club Getaway Weekend too!

In order to be placed on the guest list E Mail your full names to events@thingstodoboston.com ASAP. Tell them you are a Red Sox Native. Guests welcome but space is limited! Also, please RSVP here on the Natives Site.



See you there!
item.name: Free TTD Boston Return Launch/Kick Off Party at Ned Devines
